mapper.select: SELECT t.vacation_id, t.user_id, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.vacation_context, t2.flow_def_id, t3.ID_ task_Id, t3.NAME_ task_name, t3.PROC_INST_ID_ flow_id, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ task_def_key, t3.ASSIGNEE_ assign, t3.CREATE_TIME_ create_time FROM t_vacation_order t, tf_flow_main t2, ACT_RU_TASK t3 WHERE t.vacation_id = t2.order_no AND t2.flow_id = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ AND t.vacation_state = 1 AND t3.ASSIGNEE_ = #{userId}

SELECT t.vacation_id, t.user_id, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.vacation_context, t2.flow_def_id, t3.ID_ task_Id, t3.NAME_ task_name, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ task_def_key, t3.ASSIGNEE_ assign, t3.CREATE_TIME_ create_time FROM t_vacation_order t, tf_flow_main t2, ACT_RU_TASK t3 WHERE t.vacation_id = t2.order_no AND t2.flow_id = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ and t.vacation_id = #{vacationId}
